## Task Description
Provide a clear explanation of the DevOps-related work.

Examples:
- Add automated tests for task creation API.
- Set up staging environment for mobile app testing.
- Update CI pipeline to support Android builds.
- Configure monitoring for task deadline notifications.

---

## Component (Select all that apply)
- [ ] CI/CD Pipeline
- [ ] Infrastructure (servers, Docker, Kubernetes, cloud resources)
- [ ] Configuration Management (GitHub Actions, scripts, env vars)
- [ ] Security (access control, secrets, audits)
- [ ] Observability (logging, monitoring, alerts)
- [ ] Documentation

---

## Acceptance Criteria
Define what must be completed for this task to be considered done.

Examples:
- [ ] Pipeline runs successfully on all branches.
- [ ] New infrastructure deployed without downtime.
- [ ] Secrets stored in secure vault (no plaintext).
- [ ] Documentation updated in the DevOps folder.
- [ ] All automated tests pass.

---

## Dependencies / Blockers
List anything required before starting or finishing this task.

Examples:
- Backend API must be ready.
- Database migration needs approval.
- Environment variables from the security team.
